item.description:
Good News Everyone!
We will be trying something different for this Meetup session. We will be reading a trade paperback collection of one of my recent favorite comics, Atomic Robo Volume 1: Atomic Robo and the Fightin' Scientists of Tesladyne. The basic premise is that Nicola Tesla built a wise-cracking robot in the early part of the 20th century and it follows his creation through his unique adventures (World War 2, fighting Cthulhu, trip to Mars, etc.) It is a really funny, well drawn book and I hope you enjoy it!

We will be meeting again at Pandemonium in Central Square. There is free parking (after 6pm) in Central on Prospect Street. There is also a lot around the corner from Pandemonium on Green Street ($8 for the night). There is also T access and bus connections.

See you there!
-Josh
item.how_to_find_us: We will (hopefully) be in the upstairs part of the store near the front window.
item.name: July Book Club Meeting
